data.title: bd-xa3z: light E2E eval of Rust binary
data.description: Adds e12-rust-e2e eval scripts (setup, run, verify) that test the Rust binary end-to-end through all commands: init, sync, doctor, status, hooks, run subcommands, and re-init resilience. Test run scored 90/100 â€” two real bugs found and filed as follow-up beads (bd-2f13, bd-250e).
